title: Obama handwritten font
content:
I know he's using Gotham and Georgia on his site... but I saw this handwritten font (used on "My" and "com"). Any ideas what it is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014214241im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture1_5398.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014214241/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture1_1.jpg) | 13.29 KB |
author: wesohaire

comments.content: Probably hand written. As the [VoteForChange.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014214241/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/2884186308/) logo is (scroll down).
